Articles.Content:
I just made my first super ssto with both vtol capability and extremely good handling in the lower atmosphere. The updated unsc sabre.

Download file: https://www.dropbox.com/s/lyh7fwc644ah1c8/YSS-2600.craft

1. vtol toggle

2. turbine toggle

3. rapier toggle

4. sensor toggle

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited April 4, 2014 by andrew123
I was also testing the new engine configuration. The configuration has wielded surprising agility and range for my new replica plane.

did you add a nuke engine yet? can it land on the mun/minmus or duna/eve?

my non-vtol ssto fighter has successfully landed on duna. it was actually easier to land on duna than the mun because parachutes help you land the right way.

theoretically with external drop tanks it could even reach laythe.

Edited March 13, 2014 by Khobai
